#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define ll long long
#define sd(x) scanf("%d",&x)
int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        int n,k;
        int cnt=0;
        cin>>n>>k;
        int a[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            cin>>a[i];
            if(!((a[i]+k)%7))
                cnt++;
        }
        cout<<cnt<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
